column4: Okay, I'm following a guide on UbuntuGuide.org... and while the guide is for EDGY, its asking me to add repositories for DAPPER.  Is this going to screw stuff up?
sounds a bit suspect.  Are you trying to install something from the standard ubuntu repos?
hrm, I have no specific information, sorry. Ubotu suggests http://forum.beryl-project.org/ and #ubuntu-xgl
